This class provides an empty implementation of IDLVHEXParser\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class provides an empty implementation of IDLVHEXParser\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods.
